name: Monster Crash
description:
Remember the dumb monster in 100 ways to die. Well he is back along with some of his friends now. This time they aim to bring you a more exciting and relaxing game experience. This is a game which challenges how fast you can react. Be ready to be panic!
The game play is similar with one of the most popular games you've played in your childhood “whack-a-mole”. His friends and he keep showing in your construction site making troubles and distracting you from working. You have to catch them before they disappear. Otherwise, they just keep coming and coming. You know how the scenario ends…site closed!
Features:
* Tutorial level which allows you to study the rule of the game and explains each character. Also you can play it anytime throughout the game.
* Challenging levels: each level just gets harder and harder, no boring time allowed here.
* Different game elements: green monster, brown monster, corpse flower, fart monster and arrows. You have to obey certain rules to catch them. More fun to play.
* 3 different power-ups to assist you: shield, freeze and the magic blade. Also you can upgrade each power to make it easier for you.
* Earn free coins to purchase power-ups.
* Share your high score with friends on Facebook and Twitter. Guess who is the winner in this competition?
If you've played 100 ways to die and you feel so tired and frustrating finding ways to kill the dumb monster. This is the game for you: not so brain challenging yet fun and time-killing.
If you never see this dumb monster, you will see him plenty times in this game.
Last word: “Folks, get ready to be panic!”
